summary: Carol Anne is staying with her aunt in a high-rise building, where the supernatural forces haunting her make their return.
cast: Tom Skerritt|Nancy Allen|Heather O'Rourke|Zelda Rubinstein|Lara Flynn Boyle|Kipley Wentz|Richard Fire|Nathan Davis|Roger May|Paul Graham|Meg Weldon|Stacy Gilchrist|Joey Garfield|Christian Murphy|Roy Hytower|Meg Thalken|Dean Tokuno|Catherine Gatz|Paty Lombard|E.J. Murray|Sherry Narens|Phil Locker|Maureen Steindler|Alan Wilder|Brent Shaphren|Mindy Bell|Conrad Allan|Maureen Mueller|John Rusk|Sam Sanders|Laurie V. title: Poltergeist III
